title: Bag, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen, mirrored glass
Technique: ladder, buttonhole, surface, stem and satin stitch embroidery on plain weave
description: Red linen drawstring bag with a blue silk lining and white tassel at the bottom. Embroidered in the center with a design of stylized flowers and leaves. Narrow borders on the sides enclose circular disks with embroidered borders. Mirrored glass accents.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bag, 19th century.Medium: silk on linen, mirrored glass
Technique: ladder, buttonhole, surface, stem and satin stitch embroidery on plain weave. 1945-39-4-a.
